document.full_text: the head of libya's rebel army has condemned nato for its slow chain of command in ordering air strikes to protect civilians, saying the alliance was "letting the people of misrata die every day."
document.title: libyan rebels condemn nato over gaddafi advance
lines_and_colors: the head of libya's rebel army has condemned nato for its slow chain of command in ordering air strikes to protect civilians, saying the alliance was "letting the people of misrata die every day."
